item.title: Version 0.6.0
item.description:
What's New in v0.6.0

  • Reflection - AI-powered page analysis that classifies content and generates insights for pages worth remembering (⌘⇧R)
  • Journal - Daily browsing summaries with reading time, topics, and key insights (⌘⇧J)
  • Shield - Native ad and tracker blocking using EasyList and EasyPrivacy filter lists
  • Delete for individual reflections and history entries
  • Improved AI Settings panel and command palette organization
  • Refined About window layout
  • History list shows recent visits at top with time-only timestamp

item.title: Version 0.5.8
item.description:
What's New in v0.5.8

  • Automatic app updates via Sparkle framework with one-click install
  • AI/Search toggle in command palette (Tab key to switch)
  • Tab sidebar always visible by default
  • Display AI provider and model name in command palette responses
  • Auto-switch to Insert mode now works correctly after page refresh
  • Toolbar items positioning on first launch for macOS 15+
